titleStmt.title: An entry from the Journals of Hensley Henson

sourceDesc.bibl: Edited from the manuscripts in the custody of Durham Cathedral Library.

body.p: We travelled to Beverley, arriving there about 1 p.m. Canon Nolloth received us, & devoted the afternoon to shewing us the glorious churches of the city. In the evening I preached in the Minster to a great congregation. The Mayor & Corporation attended, & not a few clergy.
